game.title: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Lost Temple.
game.description: Legend has it that the Lost Temple holds an ancient relic with immense power. The temple is said to be cursed, but brave adventurers are needed to explore its depths and retrieve the artifact.
game.reward: Golden Amulet of Light (Grants +10% magic resistance)

tasks.objective: Clear the entrance hall of undead skeletons.
tasks.description: Fight your way through the hordes of undead skeletons and make your way deeper into the temple.

tasks.objective: Find the hidden door behind the waterfall.
tasks.description: Explore the eastern wing of the temple and find the hidden door behind the waterfall. Be cautious, as the area is said to be infested with giant spiders.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the treasure room.
tasks.description: Make your way through the treacherous tunnels and finally retrieve the ancient relic from the treasure room. But beware, for the temple's dark magic will try to stop you at all costs.
